subject: You're invited to join {{workspaceName}} on Memlernado!
htmlContent:
You're invited to join {{workspaceName}}!

Hi there,

{{inviterName}} has invited you to join the {{workspaceName}} workspace on Memlernado, your homeschool SCRUM platform!

As a learner in this workspace, you'll be able to:

  • View and work on assigned tasks
  • Track your progress with our Kanban board
  • Collaborate with other learners and facilitators
  • Plan and organize your learning sprints
Accept Invitation

This invitation will expire in 2 weeks. If you don't have an account yet, we'll help you create one when you click the link above.

If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to {{inviterName}} or our support team.

Happy learning!

The Memlernado Team
